name: Team Dungeon Heros
description:
Hello and welcome!

This is a first prototype for a much larger project which will have many more features such as: more rooms, boss fights, different Characters, upgrades and much more.

But I thought I would share the progress and maybe get some feedback?

So please report all bugs, feedback, and everything in between to the discord or directly in itch.

Cheers!

 

Controls:

WASD : move

F : change Player

Left mouse button : attack

 

Link to artists :

Weapons: https://willibab.itch.io/willibabs-simple-weapon-icons

TileSet, and other stuff : https://pixel-poem.itch.io/dungeon-assetpuck

Player: https://totuslotus.itch.io/characterpack

 

Discord:
